The house is 6 years old. Completely furnished.
description:
The house is in a great neighborhood with the Starcare Hospital in walking distance. There are stores nearby and it also comes with a balcony on the first floor and a terrace. The windows and doors have mosquito nets attached. An office room is also available. There is an AC attached to the bedroom in the ground floor. Gas connection, electricity connection and water connection is secured. There are 2 motors available for water supply. It is spacious with enough sunlight coming in. Fully furnished, it comes with 2 closets, 1 each in the master bedrooms. 

Me and my family are in another city for my job. That is the reason we are giving the house for rent. We are preferring medical college PG students/other students and hospital staff and students in coaching centers.

Super luxury 3 bhk in Noel Greenature for rent
description:
The captioned property is a super luxury 3 bhk fully furnished flat of 2280 sft area in the prestigious project of Noel Greenature, Kakkanad With great transportation connectivity and impeccable modern amenities, this project will delight you in every way. Most of the offices and shopping complexes are also located nearby. This project was awarded the Green Homes Gold Certificate by Indian Green Building Council, Kerala’s first and India’s fourth Green Residential Complex. Unique functional styling combined with lush green aesthetics can truly transform any apartment living equally enjoyable like that in a villa. Spread on a lush green environ, the complex houses over 100 villa apartments each one complete with its private garden, walkway and sky view, located near Infopark, Kakkanad. With Noel Greenature, it’s truly owning your piece of sky without losing on your little piece of earth.  Available with all facilities and amenities including Grand Entrance lobby, Lift, Banquet Hall, Event Space & Amphitheatre, aesthetically designed landscape garden, half basketball court, Fire Fighting Equipment, Kids play area, Reserved Parking, Swimming Pool, noel greenature is an ideal option to enjoy a contemporary lifestyle. Relish the benefits of living in noel greenature, which offers all modern comforts.
Kakkanad is a major industrial and residential region in the city of Kochi in Kerala. It is situated in the eastern part of the city and houses the Cochin Special Economic Zone, Infopark, Smart City and KINFRA Export Promotion Industrial Park. It is also the administrative headquarters of the District of Ernakulam. Kakkanad has a rich history and culture, as it is located near Thrikkakara. Kakkanad is also a popular tourist destination, as it offers various attractions such as spas, amusement parks, restaurants and shopping malls. Kakkanad is a great place to live, work and explore.
